Simply Bliss BBQ: Great food! Conveniently located inside the Tooele Applied Technology College

Nigh-Time Donuts: These guys know whats up! Try their bagel sandwhiches with all the fixins!

Osaka Sushi: This is the spot if you're feeling sushi! Try their 911, TNT, and the Sunny roll!

Roxberry: Roxberry never disappoints! With fresh fruit bowls and smoothies packed with nutrients how could you go wrong?

Home Depot: Working on a project? Go to Home Depot! With finance options and amazing warranties and return policies they won't disappoint!

Guzzle Soda Shack: Cool off from the summer heat with a hand crafted soda from Guzzle! Try the flavor orbs for a kick of flavor!

Mountain West Medical Center: A conveniently located, rural hospital. Rural hospitals are generally more expensive

The UPS Store: These guys are awesome! If you need the peace of mind for whatever you're shipping, brown can do it!

Security Title Insurance Agency of Utah,: Selling or buying a house? Contact these guys to make sure the exchange happens without a hitch!
